```{r}
library(tidyverse)

demo_file <- "~/Box/Mooddata_Coordinating/BABIES/Data/final_scored_data/demographics/demo_6mo_cleaned_final.csv"

cs_18_file <- "~/Box/Mooddata_Coordinating/BABIES/Data/final_scored_data/survey_18month/raw_data/survey_18mo_cs_complete.csv"
lg_18_file <- "~/Box/Mooddata_Coordinating/BABIES/Data/final_scored_data/survey_18month/raw_data/survey_18mo_lg_20200210.csv"
```

# Read in data
```{r}
m <-
  read_csv(cs_18_file) %>% 
  select(
    ID = record_id,
    date_18mo_survey = questionnaires_18mo_timestamp,
    age_first_word = aofp_1,
    primarylang_18mo:secondlang_18mo_type,
    mbcdi_1___1:mbcdi_101
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    ID = as.numeric(ID),
    date_18mo_survey = parse_date_time(date_18mo_survey, "mdy HM")
  ) %>% 
  bind_rows(
    read_csv(lg_18_file) %>% 
      select(
        ID = record_id,
        date_18mo_survey = month_survey_timestamp,
        age_first_word = aofp_1,
        primarylang_18mo:secondlang_18mo_type,
        mbcdi_1___1:mbcdi_101
      ) %>% 
      mutate(
        ID = as.numeric(ID)
      )
  ) %>% 
  left_join(
    read_csv(demo_file) %>% 
      select(
        ID,
        male,
        baby_dob
      )
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    age_18mo = (baby_dob %--% date_18mo_survey) / months(1),
    primary_english = if_else(
      primarylang_18mo == "English",
      1, 0
    )
  )
```
```{r}
m %>% 
  summarise_at(
    vars(age_18mo),
    funs(mean, sd, min, max), na.rm = TRUE
  )
```


# Clean data

Recode "understands" responses so == 1 if "understands and says" endorsed.

```{r}
understands_vars <-
  m %>% 
  select(ends_with("___1")) %>% 
  names()

says_vars <-
  m %>% 
  select(ends_with("___2")) %>% 
  names()
```

```{r}
m <-
  m %>% 
  mutate_at(
    vars(understands_vars),
    funs(
      if_else(
        get(str_replace(quote(.), "___1", "___2")) == 1,
        1, .
      )
    )
  )

```

# Score

    mbcdi_understand_tot = pmap_dbl(
      select(., understands_vars),
      function(...) sum(c(...), na.rm = TRUE)

      select(., says_vars),
      function(...) sum(c(...), na.rm = TRUE)

    mbcdi_says_percentile = case_when(
      # female norms, 18 months
      male == 0 & round(age_18mo) == 18 & (mbcdi_says_tot > 74) ~ 99,

# Reliability
```{r}
m %>% 
  select(
    understands_vars
  ) %>% 
  psych::ICC()

m %>% 
  select(
    says_vars
  ) %>% 
  psych::ICC()
```

# Visualize
```{r}
m %>% 
  ggplot(aes(age_18mo)) +
  geom_histogram()

m %>% 
  ggplot(aes(mbcdi_understand_tot)) +
  geom_histogram()

m %>% 
  ggplot(aes(mbcdi_says_tot)) +
  geom_histogram()

m %>% 
  ggplot(aes(mbcdi_says_percentile, fill = factor(male))) +
  geom_histogram(alpha = 1/2)
```

```{r}
m %>% 
  ggplot(aes(age_18mo, mbcdi_understand_tot)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")

cor.test(m$age_18mo, m$mbcdi_understand_tot)

m %>% 
  ggplot(aes(age_18mo, mbcdi_says_tot)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")

cor.test(m$age_18mo, m$mbcdi_says_tot)

m %>% 
  ggplot(aes(age_18mo, mbcdi_says_percentile)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")

cor.test(m$age_18mo, m$mbcdi_says_percentile)
```

```{r}
m %>% 
  filter(!is.na(male)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(factor(male), mbcdi_understand_tot)) +
  geom_boxplot()

t.test(m$mbcdi_understand_tot ~ m$male)

m %>% 
  filter(!is.na(male)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(factor(male), mbcdi_says_tot)) +
  geom_boxplot()

t.test(m$mbcdi_says_tot ~ m$male)

m %>% 
  filter(!is.na(male)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(factor(male), mbcdi_says_percentile)) +
  geom_boxplot()

t.test(m$mbcdi_says_percentile ~ m$male)
```

```{r}
m %>% 
  filter(!is.na(primary_english)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(factor(primary_english), mbcdi_understand_tot)) +
  geom_boxplot()

t.test(m$mbcdi_understand_tot ~ m$primary_english)

m %>% 
  filter(!is.na(primary_english)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(factor(primary_english), mbcdi_says_tot)) +
  geom_boxplot()

t.test(m$mbcdi_says_tot ~ m$primary_english)

m %>% 
  filter(!is.na(primary_english)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(factor(primary_english), mbcdi_says_percentile)) +
  geom_boxplot()

t.test(m$mbcdi_says_percentile ~ m$primary_english)
```

```{r}
mbcdi_scored <-
  m %>% 
  select(
    ID,
    age_18mo,
    mbcdi_understand_tot,
    mbcdi_says_tot,
    mbcdi_says_percentile
  )

write_csv(mbcdi_scored, "~/Box/lucy_king_files/BABIES/rsfMRI/data/language/mbcdi_scored_20200210.csv")
```
